Reviews.Title: “A welcoming staff and clean, comfortable rooms.”
Reviews.Author: travelbugsy
Reviews.Content: husband spent 4 nights monday friday easter week lovely time weve rome times time hotel italia spacious modern comfortable clean didnt guidance advice ourselves staff none help especially coming rome time friendly welcoming helpful location convenient short walk sites excellent base rome bit advice train day hill town umbria 1hr 15 min outside rome absolutely gorgeous theres tons rome nice break countryside bustle city

Reviews.Content: husband stayed 5 nights hotel impressed especially service europe size bathrooms remodeled impressive included delicious breakfast fresh pastries delicious bread yogurt cereal jams wonderful cappucino staff attentive helpful friendly home thank andrea sabrina nadine

Reviews.Title: “Our whole group loved Hotel Italia”

Reviews.Content: third time stay hotel italia time bring 25 people altogether stay hotel enjoyed trip prepared bathrooms sleep beds comfortable benefits hotel board location easy access busses metro rates affordable breakfasts ample delicious clean restaurants grocery store nearby staff helpful obvious family owns operates hotel takes pride delivering exceptional service love rome staying hotel italia
